coreAttributes.authorTag: An insignia discreetly stitched into the trouser's washing instructions tag informs you that someone by the name of 'Boondock' did the tailoring.
coreAttributes.name: Enforcer's taur-trousers
coreAttributes.description:
A set of specially-designed enforcer trousers, suitable to be fit onto the lower body of any taur race, complete with the standard telekinetic enchantments on the zipper .
Due to the additional size of a taur body Enforcer's HQ requested all Taur fit uniforms have additional kevlar added for protection

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the unzipped taur-trousers down over [npc.her] head, before allowing the weak telekinetic enchantment to zip them up beneath [npc.her] [npc.legRace]'s body and buckling the duty belt.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the unzipped taur-trousers down over [npc2.namePos] head, before zipping them up beneath [npc2.her] [npc2.legRace]'s body and buckling the duty belt into place.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] the unzipped taur-trousers down over [npc2.namePos] head, before tightly buckling the duty belt around their waist and zipping them up beneath [npc2.her] [npc2.legRace]'s body.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] unbuckles their duty belt and focuses [npc.her] thoughts on unzipping [npc.her] taur-trousers, and, sure enough, the weak telekinetic enchantment sets to work, soon allowing [npc.herHim] to take them off by pulling them up and over [npc.her] head.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unzip)] [npc2.namePos] taur-trousers, before pulling them up and over [npc2.her] head arter unbuckling their duty belt.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unzip)] [npc2.namePos] taur-trousers, before yanking them up and over [npc2.her] head. They only stop to unbuckle the duty belt after it catches and digs into their arm.
